the gathering for Vim-enthusiasts in Berlin

July 2015 Meetup


Time: Starts 27 July 7:00 pm
Location: Wunderlist , Karl-Liebknecht-Straße 32 , 10178 Berlin (map)

Comments

Talks

  • "Vim Banshee - a command line wrapper for Banshee" by Matthias Günther
    Matthias wanted to give a talk about this during the april 2015 meetup and may 2015 meetupbut will do it this time. Based on Ben Klein's book The VimL Primer: Edit Like a Pro with Vim Plugins and Scripts I started to write this plugin and I want to go through it, explain it, what future plans he has and how it was tested.
  • "Hands-on Neovim" by Matthias Günther
    Matthias will talk about his first steps with Neovim.

See you all soon.

Note

Please be in front of the office around 18:45, so that we can drive together at the Wunderlist office. If you are there later, please drop us a line on twitter so that we will pick you up.

Sponsor

Thanks to Wunderlist for hosting this event.

Matthias Günther
